Name: Starless
About the game: A flotilla of three space Arks is heading towards a distant planet. There is an accident on your Ark — the whole crew gets infected with a mysterious virus and the life support systems get damaged. Trying to save the dying ship, the AI removes one of the colonists from anabiosis. Starless is a stealth-action game where you are a colonist making your way through the murky corridors of the space Ark. Your best allies are caution and calculation. If the colonist dies, another one will take her place, but there are only so many people on board. Every death is a serious threat for the mission, because a small number of people can’t start a colony on a distant planet. Freya, the Ark’s artificial intelligence, is helping you. Her goal is to save the ship at any cost. One or two lives won’t matter to her. Game Features Three giant space Arks full of mysteries. Use gadgets — plaster mine, teleporter trap, motion detector and many others. Get access to secret modules. Contact the other Arks of the flotilla to find out about their fate. The atmosphere of bleak cold space where no one can hear you scream. Unpredictable enemies. Be prepared to improvise when you meet them Mister Scratchy. What happened to the cat who was taken on a space trip?
